content:
Add a Number Input Element to a FlexCard

To enable users to enter a numeric value, add a Number Input element on a FlexCard. Configure properties and custom attributes, add an action, and add conditions.

The user can enter the number or use stepper arrows to increase or decrease the value. When the field is empty, the value starts as 0.

Available beginning Winter '22.

From the Build panel, click Inputs, and drag the Number element onto the canvas.
Configure properties common to all Input elements:

(Optional) Bind the value of the input element to an existing or new data field.

In Field Label, enter the label that appears next to the element.

(Optional) Enter temporary text that displays inside the input field.

(Optional) Check Required if the user must enter a value for this input element.

(Optional) Check Read-only to disable the ability to modify the input values.

(Optional) Enter helpful text about the purpose of the input field.
To help your user enter data correctly, create an input mask with # or 9 characters that formats the data in a specific way.
To define a minimum and maximum Mask value, add and set the min and max attributes. Users canâ€™t enter numbers outside these values.

Users can enter numbers of any length regardless of the mask length.

Configure additional properties available to the element by clicking + Add New in the Custom Attributes section.

Click into the Attribute field to select an attribute.
In the Value field, enter a value for the attribute.
Set the maskWithSeparator attribute to true to ensure that a Mask with separators is interpreted correctly.

To execute an action when a user interacts with the input element, click + Add Action. To add conditions that must be met for the element to display, see Add Conditions to a FlexCard Element.

FlexCards Number Input Element Properties

Number Input element properties are configurable in the Properties panel when you select a Number element in the FlexCard Designer. Enable users to enter a numeric value.
REQUIRED VERSIONS
Available beginning Winter '22.
DID THIS ARTICLE SOLVE YOUR ISSUE?
Yes
No
title: Adding a Number Input Element to a FlexCard
